Reviews.Title: Samsung Ativ S I8750 This is as bad as the mobile phone
Reviews.Author: hong
Reviews.Content: Samsung Ativ S I8750 (Factory Unlocked) Windows Phone 8, Dual-core 1.5 Ghz this is as bad as the mobile phone, I just a first attempt to buy a mobile phone in the network, this is just a gift, is a gift to my brother, but the mobile phone is always suddenly stop and then automatically open, appeared 4 times a week such things, but there are important things also delayed. I was really angry, this mobile phone quality is bad, I will not buy it again, I'll have to contact the manufacturers, and then return, originally is a happy gift, but it is a bad gift.This is a waste mobile phone!This is a waste mobile phone!This is a waste mobile phone!
